Data Fields
drive_info_t Struct Reference
Stratify OS » Device Interface » Drive

Drive Info. More...

#include <drive.h>

Detailed Description

This is the data structure for accessing information about the device.

Field Documentation

◆ address_size

u16 drive_info_t::address_size

Number of bytes per address location (1 for small devices 512 for larger ones

◆ bitrate

u32 drive_info_t::bitrate

Max bitrate

◆ erase_block_size

u32 drive_info_t::erase_block_size

Minimum eraseable block size

◆ erase_block_time

u32 drive_info_t::erase_block_time

Time in microseconds to erase one block

◆ erase_device_time

u32 drive_info_t::erase_device_time

Time in microseconds to erase the device

◆ num_write_blocks

u32 drive_info_t::num_write_blocks

Number of write blocks (size is num_write_blocks*write_block_size

◆ o_events

u32 drive_info_t::o_events

MCU Event flags supported by this driver
